type.description: The type of MITM service to use.

host.description: The hostname for the MITM service.

port.description: The port number for the MITM service.

model.description: The model to use for analyzing the game.

theme.description: The theme to use for the application.

server.description: The server URL for the online service.

online.description: Whether to use the online service.

api_key.description: The API key for the online service.

autoplay.description: Whether to enable autoplay for the game.

auto_switch_model.description: Whether to automatically switch the model based on the game.

autoplay_thinker.description: Simulates human-like decision-making delays for an autoplay bot. Input `thinker` will use the thinker.py file in the autoplay/delay directory.

recommendation_temperature.description: Temperature setting for recommendation softmax scaling.
